tracks.note: All 10,000 generative Miberas from the Mibera Maker contract
All 42 hand-drawn 1/1 art pieces. These are specific token IDs within the same contract.

does_not_track.reason: Codex documents lore and metadata, not wallet balances or transfers. Use on-chain indexer.
42 canonical Grails + community Grails documented in grails/. Non-Grail 1/1 traits documented in special-collections/.
Codex is static documentation. Token transfers, marketplace activity, and balances are not tracked.
No mapping between wallets, usernames, or real-world identities and tokens.
No market prices, sales history, or floor price tracking.

stop_conditions: If searching for a named entity in a COMPLETE entity type and it's not in the index, it does not exist in the codex.
If the question involves wallet addresses or ownership, the codex cannot answer â€” use an on-chain indexer.
If the question involves a person or community member, the codex has no social identity data.
If the question involves price or market data, the codex has no financial data.
